extracted_playbook.condition: Is updating to PLCnext Engineer 2020.6 or higher possible?

extracted_playbook.title: Update to PLCnext Engineer 2020.6 or higher
extracted_playbook.description: Update the software to the latest version PLCnext Engineer 2020.6 or higher to fix the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure File Exchange Services
extracted_playbook.description: Exchange project files only using secure file exchange services to prevent unauthorized access.

extracted_playbook.title: Avoid Unencrypted Email for Project Files
extracted_playbook.description: Do not exchange project files via unencrypted email to ensure their security.

extracted_playbook.title: Verify Project File Integrity
extracted_playbook.description: Avoid importing project files from unknown sources and use checksums to verify the integrity of exchanged or stored project files.
